course_description: This writing-intensive seminar examines 20th-century music through the study of primary documents. The course provides insight into tracking the composers' creative processes, exploring the ways original sources can enrich our analysis, understanding, and performance of 20th-century music.
prerequisites: MUS 122 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2335, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: L. Emmery, Status: Open
